name: Potato and Cabbage Soup
description: Discover delicious Irish flavour with one of our favourites from the Emerald Isle.
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Meanwhile, place flour, carrots and celery in a paper or plastic bag and shake until thoroughly coated. Discard excess flour.
Remove and set aside bacon, keeping the hot fat in pan.
Add floured vegetables, reduce temperature to low and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Stir in sugar and Balsamic Vinegar.
Add potatoes, cabbage, 3 Onion Dip Mix and Nourish Broth. Stir and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add buttermilk and Lemon Dilly Dip Mix if using, heat to boiling and season with Salt and Pepper. Serve piping hot.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
